headline: A Look At Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) Valuation After Business Exit Acquisition And Guidance Upgrade
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) has reshaped its business by exiting the merchant acquirer segment, acquiring Global Payments' issuer solutions arm, and lifting its revenue guidance for fiscal 2025, drawing fresh attention to the stock. See our latest analysis for Fidelity National Information Services. Despite the recent refocus on core banking technology and the board appointment of AI specialist Anil Chakravarthy, momentum in the shares has been weak. The 30-day share price...
